== Bambolim (CT) (626733) ==

Bambolim (CT) is a town in the [[TISWADI 003]] taluka of [[NORTH GOA]] district with an area of 7.6 sq. km. and harbouring 1165 households with total population of 6885 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 6 km. The state headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 6 km. Male population is 4812 and female population is 2073. Scheduled Caste population is 172 and Scheduled Tribes population is 839. Census Location Code of the town is 626733<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (population_total 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is BELGAUM at a distance of 167 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is PUNE at a distance of 485 km. Railway station is at CARAMBOLIM CT at a distance of 16 km.

== Sanitation and Drinking Water ==  
The town has open drainage system.
Water is supplied from a service reservoir. The town gets it water as tap water from a treated source. The capacity of the water supply system is 650 kilo-litres.

The nearest fire fighting service is at PANAJI (6 km) .
